description: timeoutMS behaves correctly for retryable operations

tests.description: timeoutMS applies to whole operation, not individual attempts - insertOne on collection
operation is retried multiple times for non-zero timeoutMS - insertOne on collection
operation is retried multiple times if timeoutMS is zero - insertOne on collection
